item.title: Becca add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "there is no moment more precious than the exact moment you are living now" -- Obert Skye

item.title: Becca add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon

item.title: Becca add a quote by Angie Sage
item.description: "They would all be sorry... particularly the duck." -- Angie Sage

item.title: Becca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Becca add a quote by Judy Blume
item.description: "The truth will make you odd." -- Judy Blume

item.title: Becca add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Becca add a quote by Derek Landy
item.description: "Being a detective isn't all about torture and murder and monsters. Sometimes it gets truly unpleasant...The fate of the world may depend on whether or not you can bring yourself to visit your relatives." -- Derek Landy

item.title: Becca add a quote by Brandon Mull
Becca add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most people don't realize how important librarians are. I ran across a book recently which suggested that the peace and prosperity of a culture was solely related to how many librarians it contained. Possibly a slight overstatement. But a culture that doesn't value its librarians doesn't value ideas and without ideas, well, where are we?" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becca add a quote by Barbara Pym
item.description: "Of course it's alright for librarians to smell of drink." -- Barbara Pym

item.title: Becca add a quote by Linton Weeks
item.description: "In the nonstop tsunami of global information, librarians provide us with floaties and teach us to swim." -- Linton Weeks

item.title: Becca add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Becca add a quote by A.A. Milne
